title: I almost got scammed
selftext:
There's a company called onestopshop who sells iphones at RIDICULOUS prices such as an 13promax for 25k and a 13 for 18k so I asked him to send me the details and he sent me the original box and phone pics and then when I asked him to send me the video he told that there customer send a video of unboxing
And supposedly he unboxed a fake iphone 13
Pls stay away from thse scams. (He deleted all the proofs and I tried getting it back but he just left)
cleaned_text: almost got scammed theres company called onestopshop sells iphones ridiculous prices promax k k asked send details sent original box phone pics asked send video told customer send video unboxing supposedly unboxed fake iphone pls stay away thse scams deleted proofs tried getting back left
